oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Baptist Book Store on Broadway, Nashville, Tennessee, 1968 November
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A view of the Baptist Book Store located at 1010 Broadway in downtown Nashville, Tennessee, circa November 1968. Forms part of the Alfred Lane Futrell Collection. 1 photograph.
